title: Vehicles monitored for repeatedly joining queues
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Minister of Power and Energy Kanchana Wijesekara has tweeted saying that an illegally stocked 600 liters of fuel were taken into custody in Matara on Monday (23).

Further, island-wide raids are conducted on illegally stocked Petroleum products to be re-sold, and three-wheelers and Transport vehicles have been observed repeatedly joining fuel lines to pump fuel for re-sale, he tweeted.
